Package services

Class LoginService

Object
LoginService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAuthorisationService
public class LoginService extends Object implements IAuthorisationService
The LoginService class provides methods for user authentication and login. It implements the IAuthorisationService interface.

    • login

      public boolean login(String staffLoginID, String password)
      Method to login the user.
      Specified by:
      login in interface IAuthorisationService
      Parameters:
      staffLoginID - The staff login ID of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user is authenticated, false otherwise.

    • authenticate

      protected boolean authenticate(Account user, String password)
      Authenticates the user by comparing the provided password with the stored account password.
      Parameters:
      user - The Account object representing the user.
      password - The password to be authenticated.
      Returns:
      true if the password is correct, false otherwise.

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String loginID, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws AccountNotFoundException, PasswordMismatchException, PasswordValidationException
      Method to change the password of the user.
      Parameters:
      loginID - The login ID of the user.
      oldPassword - The old password of the user.
      newPassword - The new password to be set.
      Returns:
      true if the password is changed successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException - If the account is not found.
      PasswordMismatchException - If the old password provided does not match the stored password.
      PasswordValidationException - If the new password is invalid.

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String loginID)
      Retrieves the user with the specified login ID.
      Parameters:
      loginID - the login ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      the User object associated with the login ID, or null if no user is found

    • getAccount

      public Account getAccount(String loginID)
      Retrieves the account with the specified login ID.
      Parameters:
      loginID - the login ID of the account to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Account object associated with the login ID, or null if no account is found

    • findAccountByLoginID

      public Account findAccountByLoginID(String loginID)
      Finds an account by login ID.
      Parameters:
      loginID - The login ID of the account to find.
      Returns:
      The account with the specified login ID, or null if not found.
